div.p: No. date of Land warrant for 160 issued to David Burford

Land warrant issued to David Burford by I.E. Heath Commissioner of Pensions No. 10.470 dated 21 day of Nov 1851 for 160 acres land as 3rd Leiut in Capt. Daugherty Company, Pennsylvania, and 1st Lieut Capt. allen, Company 7th Regiment United States Infantry War 1812
the above is a tru statement of No and date of warrant for 160 Acres land issued by the United States to me.
